nDescription: Facing : North <nline> This side of the hallway has a view into a swirling field of seaweed. The light from above twinkles in between each strand like  the fluttering of a heartbeat.
eDescription: Facing : East <nline> The corridor leads back towards the elevator.
sDescription: Facing : South <nline> The view from the southside of the hallway is dazzling. Fish and all manner of sea creatures dance with one another.
wDescription: Facing : West <nline> You walk through a corridor that turns north, then west again before you enter a dazzling display. A corrider made entirely of glass moves westward. The ocean around you completely visible -- you have the slight sense of vertigo. There is a door at the end of the hallway. You can make out a large structure past the door.
